titles.title: To designate the United States Post Office located at 16250 Highway 603 in Kiln, Mississippi, as the "Ray J. Favre Post Office Building".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform and Oversight.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Postal Service.

committee.name: House Committee on Government Reform and Oversight

action.text: Subcommittee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

committee.name: House Committee on Government Reform and Oversight

action.text: Forwarded by Subcommittee to Full Committee by Voice Vote.

committee.name: House Committee on Government Reform and Oversight

action.text: Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

committee.name: House Committee on Government Reform and Oversight

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported by Voice Vote.

committee.name: House Committee on Government Reform and Oversight

action.text: Mr. Sessions moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with one forty minutes of debate.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Received in the Senate and read twice and referred to the Committee on Governmental Affairs.

calendar.text: Committee on Governmental Affairs. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

action.text: Committee on Governmental Affairs. Reported to Senate by Senator Thompson without amendment. Without written report.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 649.

bill.summary: 10/7/1997--Introduced. Designates the United States Post Office located at 16250 Highway 603 in Kiln, Mississippi, as the Ray J. Favre Post Office Building.
